title: The Wine Runner
description: Following up on the Velvet Flagon investigation, you've identified a supply runner named Moll who ferries small Void-Wine barrels from the docks to various establishments. Warden Astrid wants her intercepted and questioned.

turns.narrative: The canal docks are busy at dawn with legitimate cargo. Moll is described as a small, fast woman with a red kerchief who operates alone. Dock Foreman Hal knows her — she rents a locker at the eastern pier under a false name.
turns.choice_a: Watch the eastern pier locker and wait for Moll
turns.consequence_a: Moll arrives at dawn. She sees you before you can move, but she doesn't run — she simply stares at you with calm, calculating eyes.
turns.choice_b: Ask Hal to tip her off that someone is watching — to see how she reacts
turns.consequence_b: Hal reluctantly warns her. Moll's reaction is to move her pickup quickly, revealing her exit route.

turns.narrative: Moll is intercepted. She is more articulate than expected and refuses to name her supplier but explains her operation: she serves sick and grieving citizens who cannot afford legitimate alchemical treatments. The Void-Wine, at the dilutions she supplies, genuinely helps them function.
turns.choice_a: Arrest Moll and let the legal system sort out intent versus impact
turns.consequence_a: Moll is arrested but gives nothing up about the supply chain. Your case remains incomplete.
turns.choice_b: Offer Moll leniency in exchange for testimony about her supplier
turns.consequence_b: Moll names a warehouse in the Transit Corridor where a larger operation is staged.

turns.narrative: Based on Moll's testimony or your arrest, you update Warden Astrid.
turns.choice_a: Bring Astrid directly to the Transit Corridor warehouse immediately
turns.consequence_a: The warehouse is raided. Four barrels of Void-Wine and a supplier ledger are seized.
turns.choice_b: Document Moll's testimony formally and plan a careful sting
turns.consequence_b: A properly documented sting catches the warehouse operator red-handed.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.
